alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Perry; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 29 at 2:31PM EDT until March 30 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON AND EVENING... Dry and warm surface conditions combined with gusty winds brings an elevated risk for fire danger on Wednesday. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM EDT WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF WEST VIRGINIA AND SOUTHEAST OHIO... The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM EDT Wednesday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 009 Wood, Fire Weather Zone 010 Pleasants, Fire Weather Zone 011 Tyler, Fire Weather Zone 017 Wirt, Fire Weather Zone 018 Calhoun, Fire Weather Zone 019 Ritchie, Fire Weather Zone 020 Doddridge, Fire Weather Zone 028 Braxton, Fire Weather Zone 029 Gilmer, Fire Weather Zone 030 Lewis, Fire Weather Zone 031 Harrison, Fire Weather Zone 066 Perry, Fire Weather Zone 067 Morgan and Fire Weather Zone 076 Washington. * Timing... * Winds...South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...Between 20 and 30 percent. * Temperatures...In the mid 70s to low 80s. * Impacts...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
